Safety shoes model no. 7 nubuck leather - size 40
description.long_desc:
High-quality, functional PREMIUM S3 class leather work shoes. Shoes of the reputable brand GEKO designed to protect the feet against external factors, designed in such a way as to improve the comfort and safety of work as much as possible. Footwear in accordance with the standard specifying the requirements for safety footwear: CE EN ISO 20345: 2011.


Nubuck is a delicately sanded upper part of the leather. Just like suede, it has a delicate structure and is very pleasant. Many people are afraid that nubuck, like suede, is a material that is not resistant to damage - nothing could be further from the truth. With proper maintenance and cleaning, nubuck shoes will keep their elegant appearance for a long time. What is characteristic of nubuck is its thickness, stiffness and resistance to damage.


Product features: 
made of cowhide leather - nubuck
safety footwear category - S3
anti-electrostatic
SRC anti-slip
steel toecap with 200J protection
lining made of breathable mesh fabric - provides good ventilation
energy absorbing and reinforced heel protection
changeable insole
compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345: 2011
Protection class S3 SRC
oils, gasoline and other organic solvents resistant
anti-static 
PU / PU sole


Sole made of polyurethane (black / gray) with different densities. Equipped with a puncture-resistant steel insert with a pressing force of 1100 Newtons.


SRC - non-slip, deeply treaded sole
skid resistance on a ceramic substrate coated with sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS) solution
skid resistance on a steel substrate coated with glycerol



Technical data:
Producer: GEKO
Upper: cow leather - nubuck
Liner: airy multi-layer mesh fabric
Sole: Polyurethane PU (two different polyurethane densities)
Removable insole: yes
Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345: 2011
Protection class: S3 
Additional footwear properties: SRC

Many people are afraid that nubuck, like suede, is a material that is not resistant to damage - nothing could be further from the truth. With proper maintenance and cleaning, nubuck shoes will keep their elegant appearance for a long time. What is characteristic of nubuck is its thickness, stiffness and resistance to damage.

description.name: Safety shoes model no. 9 black nubuck leather S3 SRC - size 40
description.long_desc:
High-quality, functional PREMIUM S3 SRC class leather work boots. Boots of the popular GEKO brand designed to protect the feet against external factors, designed in such a way as to improve the comfort and safety of work as much as possible. Footwear in accordance with the standard specifying the requirements for safety footwear: CE EN ISO 20345: 2011.


Nubuck is a delicately sanded upper part of the leather. Just like suede, it has a delicate structure and is very pleasant to the touch. Many people are afraid that nubuck, like suede, is a material that is not resistant to damage - nothing could be further from the truth. With proper maintenance and cleaning, nubuck shoes will keep their elegant appearance for a long time. What is characteristic of nubuck is its thickness, stiffness and resistance to damage.


The shoes do not have metal inserts, thanks to which they do not conduct electricity, heat and cold, and are more flexible than shoes with steel inserts.


Product features:



  • made of cowhide leather - nubuck

  • safety footwear category - S3

  • have anti-electrostatic properties

  • has SRC anti-slip properties

  • composite toecap with a strength of 200J for greater protection of the toes

  • lining made of breathable mesh fabric - provides good ventilation

  • provide energy absorption in the heel area

  • reinforced built-in heel

  • the possibility of replacing the insert

  • compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345: 2011


S3 SRC PROTECTION


Safety footwear categories according to PN-EN ISO 20345:impact-resistant composite toecap with a force of 200J and a compression force of 15 kN
1100 Newtons puncture resistant Kevlar insert
built-up heel
resistance to oils, gasoline and other organic solvents
anti-static properties
energy absorption in the heel area


PU + rubber sole


The sole is made of polyurethane (black / gray) with different densities and rubber. Equipped with a puncture resistant Kevlar insert with a pressure force of 1100 Newtons.


SRC - non-slip, deeply treaded sole



  • skid resistance on a ceramic substrate coated with sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS) solution

  • skid resistance on a steel substrate coated with glycerol

Producer: GEKO

Sole: Polyurethane PU + Rubber
Removable insole: yes
Compliance with standards: CE EN ISO 20345: 2011
Protection class: S3
Additional footwear properties: SRC

description.name: Key safe 4-digit combination lock
description.long_desc:
Wysokiej jakości, solidny i przede wszystkim wytrzymały sejf na klucze. Jest to idealne rozwiązanie na osób które chcą w bezpiecznym miejscu zostawić klucze dla najemcy, klienta domku lub mieszkania wakacyjnego itp.

Sejf wykonany z najwyższej jakości twardego stopu aluminium odpornego na próby wyłamania zamka lub rozbicia młotkiem.

Posiada zabezpieczenie zamka w postaci zasuwy z tworzywa, która skutecznie chroni zamek przed warunkami atmosferycznymi.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • wykonany z najwyższej jakości stopu aluminium
  • boczne ścianki sejfu mają grubość aż 10-12mm, co sprawia że sejf jest odporny na próby wyłamania zamku lub rozbicia młotkiem
  • zamykany na 4-cyfrowy szyfr co daje 10 000 kombinacji
  • zabezpieczenie zamka w postaci zasuwy z tworzywa
  • pojemna komora na klucze
  • w komplecie zestaw kołków montażowych

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał: najwyższej jakości stop aluminium o grubości sięgającej 12mm

Zamykanie: 4-cyfrowy zamek szyfrowy

Informacje dodatkowe: zabezpieczenie zamka w postaci zasuwy, w komplecie zestaw kołków montażowych

description.name: Floor repairing kit
description.long_desc:
Zestaw do naprawy uszkodzeń powstałych w panelach, meblach, drzwiach oraz innych materiałach drewnopodobnych itp. Zestaw pozwala w estetyczni i tani sposób zamaskować pęknięcia, wyszczerbienia, a nawet otwory po wierceniu.

W skład zestawu wchodzi: przyrząd do topienia wypełniaczy, szpachelki, gąbkę polerską oraz zestaw 11 wypełniaczy.

Wypełniacze w różnych kolorach, które można ze sobą dowolnie mieszać pozwala uzyskać niemalże idealne dopasowanie kolorystyczne do naprawianej powierzchni.

Rodzaje uszkodzeń możliwych do naprawy:

  • odpryski
  • pęknięcia
  • ubytki
  • otwory po wierceniu

Materiały:

  • panele
  • drewno
  • materiały drewnopodobne

description.name: PVC Cutters with changeable blade 0-42mm SK5
description.long_desc:
Professional PVC Cutters from the reputable brand Tvardy. Designed for cutting pipes made of PVC, PU, ??PP, PE, and PEX-AL-PEX. Carefully made using the highest quality materials.


The replaceable blade is made of high-carbon SK5 tool steel characterized by very high resistance to chipping and cracking, moreover, it is a steel with high abrasion resistance, thanks to which it dulls much slower.


The cutter body is made of high-quality aluminum-based alloy.


Product Features:



  • Blade made of high-carbon tool steel with very high resistance to abrasion, cracks, and chipping, subjected to professional heat treatment (hardening and tempering at an appropriate temperature)

  • Body made of high-quality aluminum-based alloy

  • Ergonomic non-slip handle

  • Blade is replaceable

  • Working range from 0 to 42mm

  • The 10-degree blade advance prevents deformation of the cut pipes
description.short_desc:
Professional PVC Cutters from the reputable brand Tvardy. Designed for cutting pipes made of PVC, PU, ??PP, PE, and PEX-AL-PEX. Carefully made using the highest quality materials.


The replaceable blade is made of high-carbon SK5 tool steel characterized by very high resistance to chipping and cracking, moreover, it is a steel with high abrasion resistance, thanks to which it dulls much slower.


The cutter body is made of high-quality aluminum-based alloy.


Product Features:



  • Blade made of high-carbon tool steel with very high resistance to abrasion, cracks, and chipping, subjected to professional heat treatment (hardening and tempering at an appropriate temperature)

  • Body made of high-quality aluminum-based alloy

  • Ergonomic non-slip handle

  • Blade is replaceable

  • Working range from 0 to 42mm

  • The 10-degree blade advance prevents deformation of the cut pipes

Manual Twist Tiller
description.long_desc:
Manual Cultivator is a perfect tool for small gardens.


Wide T handle that reduces the effort of twisting, using the force of your body to easily rotate sharp angled claw tines into hard compacted soil. Solid shaft is made of steel and powder coated.

description.name: Air hose on reel 10m 8x12mm
description.long_desc:
Pneumatic hose on a reel made of high quality reinforced PVC material. It is characterized by high resistance to high pressure. The reel is equipped with automatic blockade preventing the hose from self-winding, and hanger allowing the hose to be hung on the wall.


Product Features:



  • High pressure resistance

  • Hose made of reinforced PVC

  • Hose reel with locking mechanism and braking system

  • Fitted with bracket so it can be mounted on the wall or ceiling and rotated up to 180°

  • Included mounting pins


Technical Data



  • Output Hose Length: 10 m

  • Input Hose Length: 1 m

  • Inner and Outer Diameter: 8 mm / 12 mm

  • Air Inlet Size: 1/4"

  • Working Perssure: 8 bar

  • Burst Pressure: 24 bar

  • Hose Material: reinforced PVC material

  • Working Temperature: from -5 to +45°C

description.name: Soaker Hose 1/2" 30m
description.long_desc:
Soaker Hose is great for watering shrubs, plants and more directly to the plant’s root zone. The porous material of a soaker hose allows water to seep out at an even, slow rate.



  • Can be used above or below ground

  • Aqua pores deliver water direct to the root zone

  • 1/2 inch diameter, 30m length

  • End cap allows multiple hoses to be joined together

  • Designed for use with low water pressure

description.long_desc: Spark Plug Wrench for many BMW nad Renault engines. 3/8-inch drive, 12 point, 14mm with thin wall. Support 3/8" drive ratchet wrench. The thin wall spark plug socket is made of chrome vanadium steel.
